;On September 23, 2023, at Qingdao Olympic Sailing Center, Xu Jingkun sailed a sailboat out to sea;(Southern People Weekly reporter Liang Chen/picture);

;

;In the autumn of 2021, Xu Jingkun decided to buy a super racing boat to participate in the 2024 Vendée Singles. Intermittent round-the-world sailing race.

;

;The Vendée Globe, held every four years, is the "Everest" of competitive sailing - more than 26,000 nautical miles (;48,000 kilometers;) is an ultra-long race in which one person and one boat sail around the earth without any supplies or supplies.

;

;“I know this is difficult, and I may not be able to do it, but I may be the closest to it. If I don’t do it quickly, there may not be any Chinese people in the next twenty or thirty years. Come and touch this event."

;

;To win a ticket to the 2024 Vendée Globe, he must first participate in the designated qualifying competition-in the 2022 season, Xu Jingkun became the first person to be selected for the "Rum Road" "The Chinese skipper of the solo transatlantic sailing race is also the first Asian skipper to finish the race in the IMOCA category. In July 2023, he and Five-Star Red Flag appeared on the official website of Vendée Globe for the first time, becoming the first official candidates for the 10th Vendée Globe in 2024.

;

;On September 4, he received a confirmation letter from the Coffee Road Organizing Committee. The team passed the 1,200 nautical mile storm test and won the qualification to participate in the 2023 Coffee Road Double Transatlantic Sailing Race. It will be held on October 10 On the 29th, it set sail from the race village of Le Havre, a famous seaport in France. This is the first time a Chinese team has been selected for the world's top two-person transoceanic competition, and it is also the first Asian team in the history of Coffee Road. Although the Café Road is not one of the five single qualifying events designated by Vendée Globe, it, like other world-renowned high-difficulty championships, can help racing boats accumulate difficult sailing miles. When the team that has obtained Vendée Globe qualification review exceeds the limit When the quota is determined, help the team win in the competition of selecting the best among the best. If the coffee road is successfully completed, Xu Jingkun is expected to seize the ticket to the 2024 Vendée Globe and become the first Chinese person to participate in the world's top offshore sailing competition.

;

;;

;

;Xu Jingkun’s super racing boat IMOCA60;(provided by the interviewee/picture);

;

;" The road ahead is too long”

;

;“Buying the IMOCA60 is indeed an important turning point. I used to sail around the China Sea and around the world. Most people can do it with hard work, but entering the field of racing , everything is different." Xu Jingkun calls the recognition from the media and insiders "everyone's praise". He himself does not take it too seriously. Only when he talks about his identity as "rowing captain", he is full of pride. . "Although I used to sail my own boats and others called me 'captain' very early on, in my mind, I didn't really consider myself a captain until I drove IMOCA60 and managed the racing team."

;

;IMOCA60 is the designated boat type for the 2024 Vendée Globe. In 2007, Xu Jingkun was training overseas in Rhode Island, USA as a member of the Chinese Disabled Sailing Team. He saw the IMOCA racing boat on the cover of a sailing magazine for the first time. "It's so dreamy, like a spaceship!"

;

;;

;

;Xu Jingkun gathered with friends at the restaurant bar where he worked back then;(Southern Characters Weekly reporter Liang Chen/Photo);

;

;With the continuous upgrade of IMOCA racing performance, traveling around the world in 80 days has long since become a reality from science fiction. The route of the Vendée Globe is not the most economical and safe trade wind route. Instead, it tries its best to incorporate dangerous capes, equatorial windless zones, and stormy waves into the course. Even so, there have been five captains in the history of the Vendée Globe. After reaching the 80-day mark, the fastest record is 74 days, 3 hours, 35 minutes and 46 seconds.

;

;Xu Jingkun never thought that one day after the Paralympic sailing team was disbanded, he would go out to sea alone, own a super racing boat, and race against the waves with the captains of the world's top professional racing boats. In 2021, there are less than 20 hydrofoil super single-hull racing boats in the world. Standing on the boat, he had a strong sense of unreality.

;

;IMOCA60 integrates the most cutting-edge monohull sailboat design and shipbuilding technology. The signature design is the swinging keel inserted vertically into the sea and the hydrofoils extending from both sides of the hull. The carbon fiber hydrofoils are light and elegant but strong enough to When standing in the wind, it looks like the wings of a flying fish, helping the ship reduce the friction of the water and achieve faster speeds.

;

;;

;

;Xu Jingkun and his wife Xiao Shuyao in their first year of circumnavigation;(Photo provided by interviewee);

;

;It can sail unimpeded in the world's dangerous sea areas and harsh sea conditions, with a maximum instantaneous speed of more than 40 knots (;1 knot Equivalent to 1 nautical mile per hour, which is 1.852 kilometers per hour;). If captains want to stay ahead of others in the Vendée Globe, they must maintain an average boat speed of more than 20 knots day and night for several months. The resistance of sea water, the load of ships and the attack of storms mean that the optimal speed of modern warships can only be about 30 knots. For a full carbon fiber monohull ship, traveling at such a speed in the deep sea is already equivalent to traveling at sea. Driving an F1 car.

;

;“Before I boarded a ship for the first time, I had never experienced it in real life. I only learned about it from watching videos. When I got on board, I found that the ship was really ‘flying’ on the sea.”

;

;Since Xu Jingkun was selected into the Chinese Disabled Sailing Team in 2005, he has been constantly exposed to various types of boats. He has completed extreme challenges such as a solo circumnavigation of the China Sea and a non-stop solo transatlantic crossing in a 6.5-meter boat. He also used it with his wife Xiao Shuyao. It took three years for the Chinese to complete the first catamaran circumnavigation of the world. "Among the many boats I have sailed before, none of them can compare with it. It is a completely different concept."

;

; A brand-new IMOCA60 sells for more than nine million euros. He bought a second-hand boat with excellent performance for "only" two to three million euros. Parking the ship at the pier of the port of Lorient, France, he carefully hung a sign on the bow to remind passing ships to keep their distance, "Don't touch my ship, I can't repair it."

;

;From then to now, he is always short of money. “The money on hand is not enough to overhaul a racing boat.” The money to buy the boat is sponsored by various brothers who love sailing. “I have never had a dedicated business team to help I found all the big sponsors myself."

;

;When he bought the boat, he insisted on going to France alone. "I didn't even bring any luggage, I just carried a backpack." He had already done it. Plan and save when you can. "The road ahead is too long, and we may not be able to go on at any time due to lack of funds."

;

;There is no upper limit on the budget to form a racing team. In his words, "Buy The boat is the first step. To maintain the racing boat every offseason, you have to spend money to buy a boat."

;

;The labor cost alone for a large racing team is one to two hundred per season. 10,000 euros, "We have kept the funds to a minimum. Now there are 5 people in the team, and we will add more people before the start of the game. The German team has 50 people."

;

;;

;

;2014, Xu Jingkun participated in the MINI TRANSAT solo transatlantic competition. "No one told me how to control this MINI with one hand. I had to find my own method" ; (provided by interviewee/picture);< /p>;

;The boat was parked at the dock and he slept in the car. After buying the boat, his wife Xiao Shuyao soon joined. The two born in the 1980s formed the "Xu Jingkun Global Sailing Team". Each person plays multiple roles: Xu Jingkun is the captain, maintenance worker, chef and video editor; most of the time, Xiao Shuyao is the only captain. His subordinates are the press officer, translator, administrator, and cashier of the fleet. Before the start of the Coffee Road race, the couple simply moved to a boat because short-term rentals were too expensive. "This boat is too spacious for two people to sleep, and it can also save an hour of commuting time."

;

;Eating is on the shore. In the container, "I also renovated a small kitchen, which is very convenient for cooking. It's great!"

;

;"Excellent" is Xu Jingkun's mantra, even if he is afraid of heights and climbed to a 30-meter-high mast. While working, his legs would tremble with nervousness, but he would still grab his phone to take pictures of the evening clouds, "It's so beautiful! It's great!"

;

;;

;

;"Length 6.5 meters, width 3 meters, interior The 529 has less than 2 square meters of space. I only got this boat a week before the start of the season. In order to save budget, I moved to that boat from that day on. When I went to sea for training during the day, I had to move all the daily necessities to the dock. I went out for the boat race, came back in the evening and moved back and it became my home. In the cold and windy Lorient, 529 became my warmest home” ; (provided by interviewee/picture) ;

;

;There is no running water in the container, so they have to go out to get water to wash the dishes. When they are busy, they often fail to wash the dishes in time, "just grab one from the dirty bowl and use it." Xu Jingkun The most interesting thing is that my wife never complains, "On the contrary, sometimes I will be pretentious and yell a few words, 'What kind of life are we living here, like savages! We have to rent a house tomorrow, and I want to sleep in the bed. , eat at the table, use clean bowls!'"

;

;"Why rent it? It's so expensive!" Xiao Shuyao shouted, and picked up the oxygen bottle he would use to clean the boat later, "Work Go! Go quickly!"

;

;;

;

;Xu Jingkun (first from right) served as the flag guard at the opening ceremony of the 2008 Beijing Olympic Games in Qingdao ; (received by Provided by the interviewer/picture);

;

;“This child is useless”

;

;“She is so interesting. Sometimes I am also observing her changes. It is my greatest pleasure now. Just teasing her. "Before meeting Xu Jingkun, Xiao Shuyao was a 100% literary young woman. After graduating from college, she traveled around the world, opened an inn in Yunnan, and went to Tibet to see Mount Everest... Xiao Shuyao herself also lamented, "In recent years, long hair, long skirts, The long shawl has been lost on the road, and I am becoming more and more neutral. I work crazily in the two time zones of China and France every day. ”

;

;“If any one of us is missing, this project will not go forward. "Xu Jingkun said that Xiao Shuyao "has a belief" in sailing. "She talks about the stories and characters in the sailing circle with great clarity. She even knows more about the data and performance of IMOCA60 than I do. "

;

;Xiao Shuyao is a well-known freelance writer in the navigation circle, with the pen name "Ajiu". She has interviewed many sailors and captains, and uses columns and podcasts to record and spread the passion and madness of sailors. Xu Jingkun feels that Xiao Shuyao loves the sea more than him and has more sailor temperament, "She is very romantic and casual, while I am very realistic and cautious. ”

;

;;

;

;In 2012, Xu Jingkun spent 7 months alone to repair the first Dream Number bit by bit; (Provided by interviewee/picture);

;

;“He never said this in person. He is a Virgo who pursues perfection. He is very demanding and never praises me. "Xiao Shuyao now helps Xu Jingkun manage the competition team. In addition to romance, her work covers everything. She takes on all the chores of the competition team. Every time she signs up for a competition, she has to fill out a lot of forms. "When I used to go to school and work, I hated filling out forms the most. , even if it is for award evaluation, if I have to fill out a form, I would rather not participate, I am too lazy to fill it out." In the past few years, I have "filled out a lifetime of forms." After each event is completed, there are thousands of emails to communicate, "There are also payments, Coordination, all kinds of bargaining..."

;

;The two first met in Sanya in 2013. Xu Jingkun was planning his first solo transatlantic trip, and Xiao Shuyao helped him sort out the conditions for the competition.

;

; “Do you think it’s possible? "Xu Jingkun asked anxiously.

;

;"Theoretically it is possible, but the ship cannot break down, the people cannot get sick, and the weather cannot have problems. Once a game is canceled or the schedule is shortened, it's all over. ”

;

;;

;

;On November 9, 2022, Xu Jingkun drove the Dream from Saint Malo to the Caribbean, a journey of 3,750 nautical miles;( Provided by interviewee/picture);

;

;The two have been tightly tied together since then, one riding the wind and waves in the sea, and the other overcoming thorns on the shore. "She treats me better than I treat myself. Confident, she always said with certainty, 'You can do it! You can do it! '"

;

;"We are much better off now than we were then. Although we are short of funds, it is not like at the beginning when we had to use our own money to buy a boat. ”

;

;;

;

;Electricity, machinery, hydraulics, structural maintenance, and sail painting are all Xu Jingkun's jobs. What requires the most physical strength is cleaning the bottom of the ship twice a week. It takes two hours to wait in the water. Three hours ;(Photo provided by interviewee);

;

;In order to participate in the 2015 MINI TRANSAT transatlantic competition, Xu Jingkun bought a pair of shoes named 529 An old 6.5-meter boat, the young couple who just got married used this boat as a temporary home. In the morning, Xu Jingkun sailed out to sea for training, and in the evening they squeezed into a small cabin of less than two square meters to spend the night, eating rice and potato cubes. , diced carrots were put into a small rice cooker brought from China and simmered in one pot. It was the "Chinese feast" that the two had in the port of Brittany, France.

;

;Xiao Shuyao never thought that Seeing that Xu Jingkun complained about suffering, Xu Jingkun said nothing and secretly marveled in his heart, "Actually, I often think about it now. She has not been suffering like me since she was a child. Why can she suffer like this with me? ”

;

;When Xu Jingkun was 12 years old, he was injured in an accident. Two-thirds of his left hand and left forearm were amputated. His brain deleted many painful memories out of self-protection. He only remembered being carried away. On the stretcher going to the hospital, a fellow countryman’s voice sounded in my ear, “This child is useless! ”

;

;Since 2015, the competitions Xu Jingkun has participated in have been the world’s top offshore sailing competitions. There is no special preferential treatment for people with disabilities. He must prove that he has the same competitive ability as normal people to be qualified. < /p>;

;Xiao Shuyao once asked him why he had such a difficult journey but never thought of giving up, "Because I have no way out. When I retreat, I just say, 'This kid is useless!' '"

;

;;

;

;Electricity, machinery, hydraulics, structural maintenance, and sail painting are all Xu Jingkun's jobs. What requires the most physical strength is cleaning the bottom of the boat twice a week. Two or three hours ;(provided by interviewee/picture);

;

;Defeat to the angry sea

;

;Xiao Shuyao and Xu Jingkun were just in When we were together, many friends around me didn’t understand, but as soon as I got in contact with them, they would naturally forget that Xu Jingkun was missing an arm, “My friends said he didn’t feel disabled. "

;

;Xu Jingkun always naturally exposes his left arm, using it to hold his mobile phone to make calls and hold the microphone during sharing meetings, "I can cut vegetables and meat, and I can also make dumplings... …Many times when I fell into the sea, I relied on it to hold me up. It’s great! It followed me really hard and this is my mark. "

;

;Xiao Shuyao believes that sailing cured Xu Jingkun, "He has encountered numerous doubts and accusations, which stimulated him to a certain extent and gave him a desire to fight when he set sail. As the voyage progressed, he felt more and more care, help, and kindness. He became peaceful and rational, and his voyage became more pure. ”

;

;Xu Jingkun agreed, “Sailing has completely changed me. "Since entering the sports school at the age of 16, he has always felt insecure in competition. "If it weren't for sports, you wouldn't be able to get out at all, so I would say that I must stay here. He often had the fear of falling into hopelessness. He was once very angry. When he was participating in the Paralympic team selection, he said to himself every day, "If you fail this time, you don't have to go back. You can just jump into the sea and die." . "

;

;After the Paralympic team was disbanded, he couldn't find his life goal for a long time. He hated a life without a sense of goal. Captain Zhai Mo's return from a global voyage gave him a direction, "It turns out that the team After disbanding, I can still sail on my own. ”

;

;His first ship and first voyage around the China Sea were full of tragedy. “A man lived alone in a small shipyard in Laoshan, busy like a madman every day, separated from life, and lost everything.” Contact may even seem to be starting to be forgotten. "He spent more than 7 months repairing and renovating an almost abandoned ship and named it "Dream". He set sail from Qingdao on September 18, 2012, "taking the brave man away and never returning it. That kind of tragic mood, even with some resentment, why does my life have to be so difficult? Why couldn't my parents come to the scene when I set sail? If you don’t believe it, I will fight to the death! With such energy! "

;

;Fa Xiao "Monkey" shouted on the shore, "Jingkun! "Jingkun!" "Oh, he yelled so sadly, I didn't dare to look back. I was gambling with fate in my heart. If I die, I will die. What's going on?" ”

;

;;

;

;Electricity, machinery, hydraulics, structural maintenance, and sail painting are all Xu Jingkun's jobs. What requires the most physical strength is cleaning the bottom of the ship twice a week. It takes two hours to wait in the water. Three hours ;(provided by interviewee/picture);

;

;Courage and Love

;

;In these years, when Xu Jingkun completed a Another goal. After feeling that he could take control of his life, his worries receded and his anger subsided. He became more and more relaxed and more professional. Friends, elder brothers and sponsors around him did not know much about him at the beginning of his career. Many people knew him through Xiao Shuyao. It was only after writing his book "The Humble Dreamer" that I learned about those past experiences.

;

;"I read that book carefully and was very touched. "Yin Zhicheng is the deputy general manager of the Dolphin Club of Qingdao Maritime Vocational School and has come into contact with many sailing people. "Jingkun is very focused and will not be easily distracted. He is persistent in his goals and moves forward step by step. When others look up, they will find that He has reached unattainable heights. ”

;

;“The biggest characteristic of Jingkun is rigor and professionalism,” Noah Tianze Insurance Brokerage Company has been a partner of Xu Jingkun and Xiao Shuyao since they started sailing around the world on a catamaran in 2017, and has been providing services to them until now. The racing team provides insurance services. Tianze Chairman Tian Feng pays close attention to the status of the racing boats. "In the Coffee Road 1,200 nautical mile qualifying competition, they must pass through the storm stage according to regulations and chase the storm. The racing boats are intact, which fully proves that He does his job very carefully. For such a big boat, he has to personally maintain every detail to achieve such a state. This professionalism is responsible for himself, his sponsors, and his family. ”

;

;“Actually, I still occasionally have (emotional) outbursts at sea. "When Rum Road crossed the Atlantic alone in 2022, he passed through three major storms in a row, with the maximum wind force exceeding 70 knots. "The whole sea surface was howling like ghosts, which was very scary. "Alone in the wind and waves, Xu Jingkun roared at the sea, "Come on! How about it! "

;

;He laughed, "No one has seen me like that, and I haven't told anyone before. Very dramatic, shouting and driving my boat into the wind and waves! ”

;

;“I also did a very risky thing that time.” There were 8 sails on the IMOCA60 racing boat, each of which weighed more than 100 kilograms. When running down Rum Road, the strong wind blew Three sails were damaged. "One sail fell directly into the sea, and the ship was still running. The more than 300 square meters of sail carried dozens of tons of seawater, and it was impossible to pull it up by human power. Xu Jingkun jumped into the cold Atlantic Ocean with a sharp blade, "cut it bit by bit, cut it into pieces and brought it back." "

;

;The most taboo thing about deep-sea navigation is the separation of people and ships. In the depths of the ocean, even rescue forces are unable to reach it. "After thinking about it afterwards, I still can't do this in the future. Xu Jingkun said that this kind of behavior was seriously inconsistent with his rational and steady nature, and he couldn't even explain it. "But these are the thoughts of people on the shore under normal circumstances. In emergencies, your thoughts will be different." If I don't jump into the sea, the sail may sink the boat and the game will be terminated. I have paid so much for this game and I am absolutely not willing to give up like this. My boat is not just a boat, it is like my child and it is impossible not to save it. ”

;

;In addition to courageous adventure races, there are also many transmissions of love between people and ships and people in extreme sailing. In 2020, Vendée Globe staged the 61-year-old legendary sailor Jean. The story of Le Cam and several captains risking their lives to rescue Captain Kevin whose ship suffered a catastrophic breakage, Xu Jingkun, who rarely sheds tears, said, “These stories can easily touch my tears. ”

;

;Captains know how to express love. Sailors who have helped each other in the most dangerous seas often participate in the Coffee Road Double Transatlantic Race. Xiao Shuyao posted on the “Xu Jingkun Global Sailing Team” public account In addition to publishing news about Xu Jingkun’s racing team, it also introduces many sailing heroes and maritime legends. She wrote this paragraph-

;

;“In 1997, the year before, I was in the Vendée Globe in an 80-knot storm. Pete Goss, who saved Rafael Dinelli from almost hypothermia, attended Dinelli's wedding as the best man, and the two teamed up to come to Café Road and won the CLASS2 category championship, becoming a leader in the offshore sailing industry. A beautiful talk. In 2012, 18 hours after the Vendée Jean Le Cam (;Yes, the one who rescued people in 2020;) capsized , Vincent Riou came to save his life, and the two teamed up to win the IMOCA category championship on Café Road. It seems to have become a tradition for the combination of life and death in the Vendée to come to the Café Road to win the championship. "

;

;"Ah Jiu knows how to sail! "Although he always likes to jokingly call Xiao Shuyao "unreliable Ah Jiu", he knows her preciousness in his heart.

;

;Xu Jingkun sincerely praised these maritime legends that transcended victory and defeat, "I like to hear them very much. She told me these people and stories, but when I asked her, she couldn't stop, so I shouted stop, stop, I'm going to work..."

;

;Reporter from "Southern People Weekly" When I met Xu Jingkun in Qingdao at the end of September, it was less than a month before the coffee road started. “I was too tired some time ago and I have to adjust. There was basically nothing arranged when I came back this time. "

;

;We walked to the Olympic Sailing Center together. The autumn wind blew over, and he squinted his eyes, "Awesome! This is the best season! Very comfortable! "

;

;"What happened to your left arm? ”

;

;The janitor of the Qingdao Olympic Sailing Center had a tanned face. He may not have been in the city for long, and he still spoke with a local accent. Xu Jingkun and a group of people passed by him, and the eldest brother blurted out such a question.

;

;“I had an accident when I was a kid. "Xu Jingkun's tone and expression were very calm, and he stopped and looked at the eldest brother with a smile.

;

;The janitor brother sat still, raised his face, his eyes were full of concern and love , continued to ask with the directness and enthusiasm of a villager, "How is your life now? ”

;

;“It’s okay, pretty good. ”

;

;He pointed us to the place where his “Dream” once docked, “There, next to the red ship.” ”

;According to a report by Shanghai's "Xinmin Evening News" on October 14, 2023, citizen Aunt Ren reported that her brother was suffering from She has severe cognitive impairment and is unable to communicate normally with others. She is still unmarried. Aunt Ren said that her brother lived with them every day and went out for more than 20 years. In 2016, a beauty shop in Beijing brought many aunts into the shop for free pedicures. They recommended massage items that "can cure diseases" and asked customers to spend money to apply for a card. , defrauding more than ten people of more than one million yuan. In the first instance, the Haidian Court sentenced beauty shop manager Zhao and store manager Feng to 10 years in prison for fraud, and sentenced three beauty technicians to fixed-term imprisonment ranging from 4 to 5 years in prison and fines. It can be seen that the beauty and hairdressing industry commits fraud against the elderly, especially the disabled elderly. Whether it is the staff who handle specific matters or business managers, those with serious cases must bear criminal liability for this.

;

;The judiciary should give the law teeth and strengthen accountability for more similar cases, and also issue a warning to businesses in various industries: setting up various consumption traps for the elderly, and even using their physical or mental illness to induce To curb their consumption, the public security organs and the law should intervene effectively.

;

;If you go one or two kilometers, your family will accompany you. In 2019, he went to the Wenfeng Wanping store in front of his home alone to get a haircut. So far, he has been "consumed" nearly 50 times at the Wenfeng Beauty Salon Wanping store and Tianyaoqiao store. His sisters have saved money for him over the years. All the nearly 600,000 yuan in medical expenses and pension funds accumulated were spent.

;

;The so-called cognitive impairment, according to Jia Jianping, chief physician of Xuanwu Hospital of Capital Medical University, cognitive impairment is also called cognitive deficit. It is often divided into two categories: mild cognitive impairment and dementia. Patients can have personality traits at the same time. , mood changes, abnormal behaviors and other manifestations. A single elderly person with cognitive and communication impairments is a person with limited capacity for civil conduct. Article 22 of the Civil Code stipulates that adults who cannot fully identify their own behavior are persons with limited capacity for civil conduct. When performing civil legal acts, they shall be represented by their legal agent or with the consent or ratification of their legal agent.

;

;Judging from the feedback from Aunt Ren and her brother, the store not only sent "special personnel" to follow them to the bank to withdraw cash or transfer money, but also "helped" the "stupid uncle" in their eyes to borrow money. Such behavior is obviously taking advantage of the elderly's cognitive impairment to deceive or force them to consume.

;

;Aunt Ren also discovered that her brother not only spent nearly 600,000 yuan in the beauty shop, but also had recharge and electronic payment records that were inconsistent in time and amount. For tens of thousands of yuan, he only had handwritten recharge vouchers but no Abnormalities appeared in Wenfeng's payment records, the payee was shown as an out-of-town advertising company, and a single consumption of "Wenfeng Body Care Golden Classic Essential Oil" reached 10,000 yuan.

;

;If Aunt Ren’s statement is true, the Wenfeng beauty shop has been suspected of fraud. "Provisions on the Standards for Filing and Prosecution of Criminal Cases under the Jurisdiction of Public Security Organs (II)" stipulates that: in contract fraud cases for the purpose of illegal possession, during the process of signing and performing the contract, the other party's property is defrauded, and the amount is more than 20,000 yuan. File a case for prosecution.

;

;Article 224 of the Criminal Law on the crime of contract fraud: Whoever defrauds public or private property, if the amount is relatively large, shall be sentenced to fixed-term imprisonment of not more than three years, criminal detention or surveillance, and shall also or solely be fined; If the amount is huge or there are other serious circumstances, he shall be sentenced to fixed-term imprisonment of not less than three years but not more than ten years, and shall also be fined; if the amount is particularly huge or there are other particularly serious circumstances, he shall be sentenced to fixed-term imprisonment of not less than ten years or life imprisonment, and shall also be fined or his property shall be confiscated. Article 1 of the Judicial Interpretation "Interpretation on Several Issues Concerning the Specific Application of Laws in Handling Criminal Cases of Fraud" stipulates: Those who defraud public or private property worth 3,000 yuan to more than 10,000 yuan, 30,000 yuan to more than 100,000 yuan, or more than 500,000 yuan, shall It should be determined as "relatively large amount", "huge amount" and "especially huge amount" as stipulated in Article 266 of the Criminal Law. Comparing the criminal law and the relevant interpretations of the Supreme People's Court and the Supreme People's Procuratorate, Auntie Ren and her brother "spent" nearly 600,000 yuan at Wenfeng Beauty Shop, which is an "extremely huge amount," and the judicial authorities should open a case for investigation.

;

;What happened to Aunt Ren and her brother is not an isolated case. As China gradually enters an aging society, the protection of the rights and interests of the elderly has attracted much attention from all walks of life. In 2016, the results of the fourth sample survey on the living conditions of the elderly in urban and rural areas in China jointly released by the National Office on Aging and the Ministry of Civil Affairs showed that there were approximately 40.63 million disabled or semi-disabled elderly people in my country, accounting for 18.3% of the elderly population. Among them, the proportion of elderly people with dementia is also not low. Disabled or semi-disabled elderly people often lose all or part of their ability to take care of themselves, and their spouses and children, who are guardians, are unable to be with them at all times due to various reasons, which makes it easy for some criminals to take advantage of them.

;

;"Old people and old people" are social ethics, but some people regard the elderly as lambs to be slaughtered. In recent years, illegal cases targeting the elderly have been repeatedly exposed. In April 2022, the Ping An China Construction Coordination Group took the lead in deploying a nationwide special operation to crack down on pension fraud. In June, the Supreme People's Procuratorate announced 6 typical cases to crack down on pension fraud crimes. The 6 typical cases covered various types of pensions such as investing in the pension industry, booking pension apartments, selling collectibles, providing diagnosis and treatment services for the elderly, and handling "pension pensions". Typical fraud methods involve crimes related to fund-raising fraud, illegal absorption of public deposits, fraud, infringement of citizens’ personal information and other crimes related to pension fraud. The deeper the schemes that harm the elderly, the more accountability the law should have.

; Tue, 17 Oct 2023 14:25:03 +0800 公费定向师范生违约屡见不鲜，多集中于工作后http://www.infzm.com/contents/258728
;;2023-10-17 13:00:00;
;

;A few days ago, the Education Bureau of Lufeng City, Guangdong Province issued the "Guangdong Province Publicly Funded Targeted Training of Primary and Secondary Schools in Eastern Guangdong, Western Guangdong and Northern Guangdong" Teacher (directed to Shanwei Lufeng) List of defaulters" has attracted social attention. The list shows that a total of five graduates have failed to fulfill their obligations.

;

;In fact, according to a Nandu reporter’s investigation, it is not uncommon for publicly funded normal college students to default on their contracts in recent years. As a class teacher for the school's public-funded normal students, Professor Xie Ailei, executive vice president of the Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macao Greater Bay Area Social Development and Education Policy Research Institute of Guangzhou University, said in an exclusive interview with Nandu that although the proportion of defaulters is not large, the number of defaulters is There is an obvious upward trend, and "it is more common to break the contract after working."

;

;In his view, student breach of contract reflects the conflict between personal interests and public interests. If students' personal sense of gain can be increased from policy and other levels, a win-win situation between public and personal interests can actually be achieved. To this end, he suggested that relevant government departments should carry out more "post-incentive" measures on the basis of "pre-compensation".

;

;Phenomena: In recent years, there have been more breaches of contract after the announcement of non-performing lists in many places

;

;It is understood that in 2020, the Guangdong Provincial Department of Education, the Office of the Institutional Establishment Committee of the Guangdong Provincial Committee of the Communist Party of China, and the Guangdong Provincial The Department of Finance and the Guangdong Provincial Department of Human Resources and Social Security issued the "Implementation Measures for the Publicly Funded Targeted Training of Primary and Secondary School Teachers in Eastern Guangdong, Western Guangdong and Northern Guangdong."

;

;It is mentioned that in order to further accurately supplement rural teachers, optimize the allocation of teacher resources, and improve the overall quality of the teaching team in Guangdong Province, in accordance with the principles of "voluntary registration, selective admissions, public-funded training, targeted teaching, and limited-time service" , every year, we train a group of high-quality teachers in preschool education, special education, primary education (all subjects) and compulsory education for primary and secondary schools in eastern Guangdong, western Guangdong and northern Guangdong in urgently needed subjects such as music, physical education, and art, and train professional teachers for high school students. Teachers with outstanding and profound graduate education.

;

;;;

;; An investigation by Nandu reporters found that the "Guangdong Province Publicly Funded Targeted Training of Primary and Secondary Teachers in Eastern Guangdong, Western Guangdong, and Northern Guangdong" was released at the end of September this year, and a total of 5 graduates failed to do so. Fulfillment of contract, graduation date is June 2023. ;

;

;This is not the first time that Shanwei Lufeng has announced the list of defaulters. In February 2022, 4 graduates failed to fulfill their obligations, and their graduation date will be June 2021; in November, two more graduates failed to fulfill their obligations, and their graduation date will be June 2022.

;

;Also in September this year, the Education Bureau of Leizhou City, Guangdong Province issued a notice that two people failed to perform their contracts due to personal reasons after graduating in 2023; the other two people graduated in 2022 and served for one year in Leizhou City due to No longer performing the contract due to personal reasons. In October, Chaozhou Chaoan also announced a list of defaulters. Three people failed to perform their contracts due to personal reasons, and their graduation date is June 2023.

;

;;;

;;

;

;In addition, in recent years, places such as Shanwei Haifeng, Maoming Huazhou, Yunfu Yunan, Qingyuan Liannan and other places have also announced default lists. There are cases where fresh graduates have defaulted, and some have defaulted after working.

;

;According to the survey, public-funded normal school students teach in schools (including village primary schools and teaching sites) arranged by the orientation for no less than 6 years. During the prescribed service period, public-funded targeted training recipients shall not fail to perform the limited-time service agreement on the grounds of further education or transfer.

;

;So, how much is the cost of default? The "Implementation Measures" clearly state that for those who fail to fulfill the provisions of the agreement during the service period, all localities are responsible for recovering the training funds enjoyed by the public-funded targeted training subjects in accordance with regulations, and collecting liquidated damages based on 30% of the total training funds. If more than 1 Overdue payment penalties will be charged at a rate of 1‰ of the payable fee for each day within the monthly payment time limit. Any breach of contract shall be recorded in the personnel files and social credit system and announced. The default refund funds collected by various localities are specially used to support and subsidize the construction of local primary and secondary school teachers in accordance with the principle of "who manages, who uses, and who is responsible".

;

;Analysis: Breach of contract reflects the conflict between personal interests and public interests

;

;“According to survey research, the proportion of defaults by public-funded normal college students is not large, but the number of defaults is significantly higher. The upward trend has therefore attracted widespread attention from society." Xie Ailei told reporters that breach of contract can actually be divided into active breach of contract and passive breach of contract.

;

;On the passive side, the "Implementation Measures" have relevant provisions. If students fail to obtain a graduation certificate or degree certificate within the basic period of study, or their studies are interrupted due to personal reasons (except for physical health or enlistment) If academic and other circumstances arise, "with the approval of the training institution and the place of origin of the plan, the qualification for public-funded targeted training will be cancelled, and the host university will be responsible for handling it in accordance with relevant national regulations."

;

;In terms of initiative, for fresh graduates, they are dissatisfied with the scope, current situation, and environment of the rural teacher job they want to go to after graduation, and hope to pursue a higher-level job unit. Some students also hope to further their studies. And breach of contract. For working graduates, the main problem is that their development demands are not met. Since they have accumulated enough experience and capital, graduates hope to move to better jobs and have enough financial foundation to pay liquidated damages and default.

;

;In addition, some public-funded normal school students who are already working are unable to adapt to the actual local work conditions, culture and atmosphere, and leave their posts before reaching the contracted working period. According to investigations, some local competent authorities failed to scientifically predict, rationally plan, and make timely adjustments when formulating the needs of public-funded directional training plans, which led to problems in job matching for public-funded oriented normal school students after graduation, and the phenomenon of "sending teachers wherever there is a shortage." "Go" and other situations where "teaching profession and job position do not match or do not match".

;

;"Generally speaking, most defaults occur after graduation, and it is more common to default after working for several years." Xie Ailei said.

;

;As the head teacher of the orientation class, Xie Ailei also observed that not all students knew the actual situation of the project when they first enrolled. "Including the students I teach, some of them were chosen with the help of their parents. They don't know much about the position of orientation teachers and their future work conditions." He told Nandu reporters: "I have noticed some trends. Students who have just entered school are At that time, many people paid more attention to the cost and responsibility of breach of contract, but did not fully understand the place where they would work in the future. By the time they are in their sophomore year, students began to be anxious, thinking about what to do when they go back to work, whether there are other options after graduation, etc. In their junior year, students think about what to do if they don’t adapt when they go back, what will happen after six years of orientation, etc.”

;

;From a sociological perspective, one of the major reasons for breach of contract is that students In the early stage, the reality was not recognized when making choices, and in the later stage, career identity was not fully developed. From the perspective of educational economics, breach of contract actually reflects the conflict between personal interests and public interests, and students cannot be blamed blindly; if it can increase students' personal sense of gain, it can also achieve a win-win situation for public and personal interests.

;

;To this end, Xie Ailei has carried out targeted intervention since the beginning of freshmen's enrollment. Through regular one-on-one communication, class meetings and other forms, he has popularized the rights and obligations of publicly funded normal school students and the connotation of teachers' work. , future workplace environment, etc., and lead students to conduct surveys of schools in counties in eastern Guangdong, western Guangdong, and northern Guangdong, in order to enhance students' sense of career and job identity. "It has been observed that students who default after graduation mainly leave their jobs, but rarely leave the teaching profession. If schools and teachers can consciously intervene, students' professional identity, career identity, and job identity will have better results.";

;Recommendation: Implement "post-incentive" measures on the basis of "pre-compensation"

;

;Although there is a restriction mechanism at the policy level for defaults. But in Xie Ailei's view, punishment can only be said to be a cover-up, but it cannot fundamentally solve the problem.

;

;He suggested that students need to think more fully about their career plans and understand the work content and actual working conditions of rural teachers before entering publicly funded targeted projects.

;

;For training institutions, it is necessary to focus on grasping the key time points in the early stage of volunteer application and increase publicity. After students enroll, colleges and universities must also start from a management perspective. While allowing students to fully master professional skills, they must continue to pay attention to and guide students' career and job identity.

;

;For local education departments, it is necessary to combine the actual situation of teacher education reform and development, scientifically predict the supplementary demand for teachers in shortage subjects in the basic education field in the region, and reasonably prepare annual public-funded targeted training plans.

;

;In addition, relevant government departments should also carry out more "post-incentive" measures on the basis of "pre-compensation".

;

;For example, government departments can implement a classified and hierarchical reward mechanism based on the remoteness of the school, environmental conditions, etc. "One of my students did a survey using data from middle school teachers in counties in eastern Guangdong, western Guangdong and northern Guangdong. It was found that the farther the school is from the economically developed areas of the Pearl River Delta, the more teachers want to move. If we look at this situation, is there a difference? A personalized reward mechanism."

;

;At the same time, rewards will be provided based on the number of years of performance, and more opportunities and preferential treatment policies will be given in terms of professional development and promotion channels to enhance the work motivation of public-funded normal school students. The "Implementation Measures" propose that targets of public-funded targeted training are encouraged to improve their academic qualifications through self-study examinations, correspondence courses, and on-the-job postgraduate studies. Xie Ailei also mentioned that high-level normal universities can be jointly established to establish targeted teacher training collaborative training centers to provide qualified graduates with high-level master's degrees in education and solve their worries in terms of institutional mechanisms.

;

;"Whether students can obtain high-quality mobility after they have completed their obligations is also one of the methods worth considering." Xie Ailei said.

; Tue, 17 Oct 2023 13:25:02 +0800 原来还有这种工作？那些年轻人的新职业http://www.infzm.com/contents/258686
;;2023-10-17 12:00:00;
;

;;

;

;In recent years, many new professions have emerged. In 2019, a "rabbit taster" working for a spicy braised food e-commerce company attracted attention. He tries to eat more than 2,000 rabbit heads every year. ;(Visual China Pictures/Pictures);

;

;At dawn, Wang Fei and her party prepared enough dry food and drove through the Gobi Desert for hundreds of kilometers. , there are heavy mountains ahead, no one can be seen, and there is no signal. They need to constantly observe weather changes, calculate the water and oil stocks, and put some dry food along the way when going to the mine.

;

;The road in the mine was extremely narrow, and the wheels pressed against the edge of the cliff. They almost did not dare to take a big breath. Finally reaching an altitude of 4,500 meters, looking around, all kinds of jade materials are scattered on the ground.

;

;This is a microcosm of Wang Fei’s treasure hunting process. She is a gem hunter, a profession full of excitement and thrills every day. Her story was recorded in the book "New Careers".

;

;According to data released by the National Bureau of Statistics, in August 2023, the national urban surveyed unemployment rate was 5.2%, a decrease from the previous month and the same period last year. In April, the national survey unemployment rate for labor force aged 16-24 was 20.4%, and the youth unemployment rate exceeded 20% for the first time. Nowadays, with the downsizing within the system and layoffs in the Internet, more and more young people are no longer bound to a certain "cubic room", but are beginning to break away from traditional industries and seek emerging careers.

;

;In 2021, the "2021 New Career Guide for Youth" released by Bilibili and DT Finance showed that 12% of young people are already trying new careers part-time, 5.5% are working full-time, and 58.5% want to try but No action has been taken yet. 78% of young people prefer a new career because it “matches their interests and hobbies.”

;

;"Taobao Unpopular New Career Observation in 2021" takes stock of the top ten unpopular new careers, namely: doll doctor, dream painter, succulent foster nurse, game face pincher, organizer and storage master, cloud maker , cat food taster, armor caster, live broadcast room set designer, mobile phone embalmer.

;

;Many new occupations are neither large-scale nor stable enough. For example, the cloud makers mentioned above, they simulate the appearance of clouds, from mold making, shaping, polishing to finished products, are stored in transparent cubes, but there are only a few practitioners. This does not prevent some new professionals from turning their love into a career and exploring a special way of survival.

;

;Here are some stories from those in new careers:

;

;;

;

;Henna hand-painted looks somewhat similar to tattoos at first glance, but it is actually hand-painted on the skin with plant pigments. It subsides naturally in about two weeks. After becoming a henna master, Thirteen sometimes encountered strange looks. ;(Photo courtesy of interviewee);

;

;;Henna Master;;: ";;Painted, it doesn’t hurt;;”;

;

;Shisan is often mistaken for a tattoo artist. Because she posted henna hand-drawn patterns in her circle of friends, before renting an apartment, her co-tenant mistakenly thought she was a tattoo artist and made excuses to refuse.

;

;Although they are all painted on the human body, henna hand-painting is actually a paste of plant pigments made from henna flowers that is painted on the skin. It is popular in the Middle East and India and is generally only left on the skin. It will subside naturally after about two weeks.

;

;"It's not written, it's not posted, it's painted! It doesn't hurt!" Shisan deliberately hung a conspicuous slogan on the stall.

;

;After graduating from high school, Shisan moved around in different cities and lost count of how many jobs he had. She tried Henna hand-painting after being introduced by a friend and earned 2,000 yuan in 4 days. When she practiced most crazily, she painted almost all the places on her body that could be painted.

;

;Now, Thirteen has been a full-time henna practitioner for five years. Every night at the market in Shenzhen, she immersed herself in painting, her long blue and red hair standing out among the crowd. Within ten minutes, a henna pattern incorporating vines, flowers and other imagery appeared on the back of the customer's hand. For her, the most difficult thing is to control the amount of paste squeezed out. If the amount is not appropriate, the lines will not be smooth and beautiful enough.

;

;A client, an office worker who works in foreign trade, requested that Thirteen be painted somewhere that could be covered by his clothes. Her workplace requires formality. After get off work, she can be herself again and show off her body patterns.

;

;A junior high school student was brought in by his mother. His wrists were covered with self-inflicted scratches, hoping to cover them with drawings. Thirteen drew a cartoon pattern for him and said in a relaxed manner: After drawing such a beautiful pattern, I will no longer be able to scratch myself with sharp objects. The boy agreed.

;

;Occasionally, she would encounter strange people and strange looks. A strange man pointed at the "shrimp line" pattern on her neck and called her scary. Fortunately, Thirteen doesn't care, "I can't change myself because of their personal aesthetics."

;

;;Organizer;;: “It’s a human home, so what?”;

;

;Li Nannan travels around the city every day Every corner of the house is sorted and summarized for different people. She received professional training from a housekeeping company and needed to organize clothes by category and color, or arrange cosmetics on the dressing table by bottle height.

;

;Although the storage work is tedious and long, the secrets in those private spaces are nerve-wracking.

;

;One night at 11 o'clock, Li Nannan went to a male anchor's home to do some storage and found that there were plus-size women's clothes and wigs in the closet. He speculated that he might be dressing up as a woman for a live broadcast. She said that this "atypical living situation" is very interesting.

;

;Some houses are unimaginably messy. Once, Li Nannan dug out a large number of express delivery boxes from the corner of the room, and was about to sort them into categories. As soon as he opened the boxes, many squirming bugs, cockroaches and mice crawled out.

;

;"It's all a human home, so what? There's nothing particularly dangerous. What's more difficult to deal with is that the client's unresolved emotions are placed on me. Human situations are not easy to deal with. ." Li Nannan told Southern Weekend reporters.

;

;Sometimes customers would quarrel among themselves while they were sorting things out. Li Nannan was used to it and didn't feel embarrassed. Occasionally, some anger would burn into her, and customers would pick on her for no apparent reason, and the door-to-door collector would become the punching bag for conflicts in the family.

;

;Once, a customer blamed her for putting valuables and worthless items together, blaming her for being unprofessional and uninformed. At this time, Li Nannan adheres to the principle of "silence is golden", talking less and doing more.

;

;In this job, Li Nannan has seen all kinds of things in the world. A junior high school student asked her to clean up his study room while his parents were not at home. The boy was always at home alone during that summer vacation. After cleaning up, he asked Li Nannan to stay and play games together. Later, Li Nannan went to play with him a few more times, as if he had seen himself as a teenager.

;

;;Simulated Pet Customizer;;: ;;Keep it with you;

;

;Worked as a veterinarian for two years Chen Ziting has encountered many helpless situations. Facing the anxious faces of pet owners, she found it difficult to ask them to say their final goodbyes to their pets, and sometimes she even cried together. In the long run, it was difficult for her to bear so much sadness.

;

;Later, she began to make simulated pets out of wool felt, making them into pendants, ornaments or keychains. Some were only made for the head of the pet, and some were made for the whole body, which were all made stitch by stitch. of.

;

;Two-thirds of the customers who came to customize their pets had passed away. They took photos of their pets while they were still alive and hoped to use the simulated version as a souvenir. Many owners can't help crying when they see the appearance of their pets when they receive the express delivery.

;

;A customer customized a head ornament for her Garfield cat. This cat has been with her since graduation. Later, the kitten developed a skin disease, and the owner specially changed his job for him and moved to a drier city. But during one of her business trips, Garfield suffered a heart attack and died suddenly. She drove back overnight to have him cremated. She found Chen Ziting, hoping to keep it with her in another form.

;

;Chen Ziting also has a cat, and her pet is "like a family member" to her. She understands the owner's extreme sadness and reluctance after the pet leaves. She hopes that after the tragedy, "there is still something more that can be done for them."

;

;;Animal Communicator;;: ";;It;;s need to be respected";

;

;Animal communicator Luo Xinyan also tried to do something for these sad pet owners.

;

;She is a Taiwanese living in Guangdong, and her main job is to communicate with animals. In Taiwan, this is a relatively mature profession with specialized industry associations and training courses. Communicators believe that they can communicate with the souls of animals through sounds, images, thoughts, and even tastes.

;

;Before starting communication, Luo Xinyan usually asks the owner to "predict" to the pet, informing them that a communicator will chat with them, and first obtain basic information and recent photos of the pet. She claimed that this would help the pets cooperate, "I know you are coming to me because my mother said so."

;

;One of the more special ones is the communication with the deceased pet. According to Luo Xinyan, it usually takes 7-14 days after the death of the pet to make an appointment. In her account, the "conversation" with a deceased puppy went like this:

;

;"How are you doing in the animal kingdom (heaven)? What are you doing?" "There is nothing to do. , sometimes it gets a little boring."

;

;"Do you like the place where the ashes are placed?" "Yes, I also like the color."

;

;An owner's puppy once died of illness Finally, he anxiously found Luo Xinyan and wanted to know how he was doing after his death and whether he had received the gifts and paper money he had burned. Luo Xinyan said that she explained to the puppy that the pile of soft paper next to it was money given by her father, and she also saw small objects such as balls and dolls. After hearing this, the man of the house excitedly confirmed that he had indeed burned these things.

;

;After the death of the puppy, the hostess blamed herself deeply, believing that she had not taken good care of the puppy. Luo Xinyan said that the puppy asked her to convey that it was not their fault that her death was not their fault, so she did not need to worry about it and would live happily in the future. While no one else could hear or verify the authenticity of these conversations, the owners did find relief.

;

;For Luo Xinyan, every animal is an individual, "with feelings, love, innocence, and tolerance. They need to be respected."

;

;;

;

;Customers seeking doll restoration are mostly reluctant to throw away the dolls that have been with them for many years and treat them as friends. ;(Photo courtesy of interviewee);

;

;;Doll Restorer;;:; ;It is not a toy, it is my friend;

;

;Some people are reluctant to part with their pets, while others place their emotions on the dolls that have been with them for many years.

;

;Lu Xiaoxi has a white stuffed rabbit that has been with her for seventeen years. It is only as big as a forearm. As she grew from a child to an adult over the course of seventeen years, the little rabbit's originally dense plush began to fall away, becoming almost bare in some areas.

;

;She accidentally saw someone on the Internet who specialized in doll restoration and wanted to send it for restoration, but the high price put her off. When Lu Xiaoxi was a child, she learned a little bit of sewing from her grandmother, and then tried to repair it by herself.

;

;The hair on the rabbit's mouth, hands, and feet was almost all gone, and the areas that needed to be repaired were large. She repaired them on and off for a month before re-planting the hair in these areas. After that, Lu Xiaoxi started taking orders and repairing dolls as a part-time job.

;

;Some dolls are severely worn and need hair transplantation, some need to be filled with cotton, and some have just cracked lines and need to be mended. Restoring a doll usually takes a week or two.

;

;Hair transplantation is the most troublesome. If there is only a small amount of hair loss, you can remove the floating hair from the doll, rub it into a small handful, and then press it back with tweezers according to the grid pattern in the doll. If the shedding is too severe, like her rabbit, you have to buy new wool cloth, pull out the hair and replant it. It usually takes two to three hours to transplant a small area, and the hands will be very painful.

;

;Lu Xiaoxi likes this new job very much. She feels that dolls carry many memories. Even if the doll is seriously damaged, the owner is reluctant to throw it away. She understands this sentiment very well.

;

;A customer once sent a bear that needed repair and included a letter. The letter was written in the tone of a little bear. He said that he had been accompanying his owner for thirteen years and had followed her to many places, hoping to help restore it.

;

;"They are not toys, they are almost like friends." Lu Xiaoxi told Southern Weekend reporters.

;

;;

;

;Makeup restorer Liu Cheng charges 20-40 yuan per order, and the price is based on the difficulty of the repair, with a monthly income of tens of thousands of yuan. ;(Photo courtesy of interviewee);

;

;;Makeup Repair Technician;;:; ;Twenty yuan per order, monthly income of tens of thousands;

;

;If the restoration of dolls is out of deep emotion, then the customers who repair cosmetics have more practical purposes. .

;

;The workbench of makeup restorer Liu Cheng is like a laboratory, with sterilization cabinets, lipstick molds, powder compaction plates, films, beakers, etc. As a man who knew nothing about makeup not long ago, he is now familiar with the common brands on the market.

;

;He used to be engaged in real estate, and his entry into the industry was purely accidental. When he had nothing to do during the epidemic, he found that some of his wife's cosmetics were broken, but it was a pity to throw them away. He tried to repair them several times and the results were good. A few months ago, his wife started taking orders for him online.

;

;This job is quite delicate. When Liu Cheng repaired a certain powder earlier, he followed the established steps, but the effect was not very good. Later he discovered that the powder also had a baked texture and different techniques, so the method was certainly not universal. After studying the corresponding texture, it was finally repaired.

;

;On social platforms such as Douyin and Xiaohongshu, makeup repair bloggers are not uncommon. Their business covers a wide range of products, including powder repair, makeup packaging and packaging, lipstick color change, etc.

;

;According to Liu Cheng's observation, most of the customers are young college students. Generally speaking, there are women aged 18 to 40, and the market is very huge. Some of the people who patronize makeup restoration are thrifty and frugal, while others do so because the items were given as gifts to relatives and friends and do not want to part with the emotional meaning they carry.

;

;Powder powder and lipstick are most often repaired. Powder powder is usually broken and needs to be restored, lipstick may be broken, or the color may be changed.

;

;Repair is not always smooth. Once to repair lipstick, Liu Cheng reworked it 4 times. In one case, there were still cracks and bubbles after the repair. In another time, the lipstick stuck to the wall of the cup during the melting process. Only a quarter of it was left after repair, so he had to Melted again.

;

;Liu Cheng's repair cost is about 20 yuan per repair, and the more difficult ones cost 30 or 40 yuan. Currently, he can earn more than 10,000 yuan per month.

;

;;Pet Agent;;: ;;Dedicated Talent Scout;

;

;As a pet agent, Shuangshuang's job is to connect brands and pet models, and to find pets of different species through various channels and to find cooperative models.

;

;One time while shopping in a shopping mall, she saw a girl walking by with a beautiful border collie. They both immediately chased after her, and it took them three floors to catch up, and successfully got the owner's contact information.

;

;Its coat color is a rare three-color meteorite among border collie breeds, its eyes are particularly blue, and its body is not large. They both saw it as a good model at a glance. Moreover, it follows its owner obediently in a crowded shopping mall, which shows that it has good stability and is suitable for studio shooting.

;

;It turns out that Shuangshuang, the talent scout, has a good eye. On the day of the shooting, this border collie showed a high degree of cooperation. It only took 13 minutes to complete the shooting of seven different angles and postures, while the average mock-up shooting time for ordinary pets is half an hour to an hour. .

;

;Shuangshuang is unwilling to disclose the specific price of the pet, which is considered a business secret. She introduced the general market situation. The daily appearance fee of a professional pet model is about 1,000 to 2,000 yuan. However, different pets have different values. If they have outstanding appearance, camera-like appearance, high stability and cooperation, the treatment will be higher. The owner’s easy communication and free time are also bonus points.

;

;To be a good pet agent, Shuangshuang needs to collect as many varieties of pets as possible. The same variety also needs different colors and sizes. It is best to have three or four pets of the same size and color. If there is an accident during the shooting, you can replace them at any time.

;

;During the shooting, Shuangshuang will transform into an assistant, following the pet model at any time to take care of, guide and comfort it. Once when I was on location, as soon as I arrived at the shooting location, the model dog started fighting with other dogs passing by. Together with her colleagues, she "pressed down" her own model and asked someone to quickly take the other one away.

;

;Surrounding your pets every day makes you both feel happy. When she was feeling down, the dog stretched out its paw to touch her, which made her feel healed. "Every moment was touching."

;

;;Pet daycare manager;;: ;;“It’s like a child going to kindergarten”;

;

;Ren Mengyin She likes animals. She has a cat and two dogs, the oldest is eight years old and the youngest is six years old. She has had pets since she was a student, and her time with them has dropped sharply after working. She found that this is also the current situation of most office workers. They leave early and come home late, and their pets can only stay at home by themselves.

;

;She co-opened a dog day care store with her friends, targeting these office workers. During the day, before they go to work, they leave their puppies in the store, "just like children going to kindergarten." Most parents will apply for one "semester", which is 30 days.

;

;In the morning, they use the "school bus" to pick up the dogs and send them home in the evening. Dogs usually have breakfast in the store, and they basically bring their own food. The daily "school" schedule is full, such as the afternoon tea session, and different activities are designed. Sometimes they are fed with leaky toys, or snacks are placed on the lawn for them to find and eat on their own. In the evening, Ren Mengyin and her colleagues will take their dogs for a walk by the stream outside the store.

;

;Just as each class has students with different personalities, there are also "i dogs" and "e dogs" among dogs. They will "teach students in accordance with their aptitude". For "i dogs" who don't like to socialize, what attracts them more is the smell, touch and atmosphere. When they first come to daycare, let "i dogs" slowly observe and adapt to the environment. Some small dogs The dog may find a comfortable place to sun itself. The "e dog" has a cheerful personality and will take the initiative to play with other dogs.

;

;Three or four times a month, the daycare store will organize activities similar to autumn outings, taking the dogs to the beach or grassland and playing some circuit games or tug-of-war games.

;

;Ren Mengyin always remembers that scene. It was raining once, bamboo leaves were swaying in the rain, and the dogs were sniffing the smell in the air in an area near the outdoors. Seeing this scene, she suddenly felt a sense of accomplishment, "They are satisfied, and it seems like you have nothing else to ask for."

; Tue, 17 Oct 2023 10:55:02 +0800 河南郸城几百农民哄抢玉米上热搜：维护农业投资者权益不能和稀泥丨快评http://www.infzm.com/contents/258678
;;2023-10-17 10:00:00;
;

;A few days ago, a video of a corn field being robbed by hundreds of nearby farmers in Dancheng County, Zhoukou, Henan became Social media hot spots.

;

;According to reports from the Beijing News and other media, on October 14, 2023, a video of many farmers "grabbing corn" became a hot search on social media. In the video, a cornfield is crowded with people. The road next to it is filled with tricycles of all sizes, and some cars drive directly into the field. The voice of an eyewitness in the video said that the cornfield totaled 2,000 acres, and hundreds of acres had been robbed. The police could not stop it because there were too many villagers. The video also shows police arriving at the scene. At the end of the video, the local township government staff said that the township chief had arrived to maintain order.

;

;The local township government and the Dancheng County Agriculture and Rural Affairs Bureau later denied that looting had occurred, saying that the farmers only went to the harvested plots to "pick up" the missed corn. According to the situation statement issued by the Dancheng County Agriculture and Rural Affairs Bureau, there are not as many corn fields as 2,000 acres, only 400 acres. After the company that contracted the land to grow corn contacted the township government, the township government "immediately arranged for village cadres and police station police to go to the scene to maintain order, persuade the people to leave in an orderly manner, and the machine collection work was carried out normally." In the afternoon of that day, the company's 400 acres of corn had been harvested.

;

;Is it looting or picking up? Judging from the video, most people are indeed picking corn in the harvested fields. However, according to eyewitnesses, these people did follow the harvester to pick it up at first, but then many people gathered around and the harvester could not move, and many people started to grab it. To take a step back, even if the land has been harvested by machines, can we pick it up immediately?

;

;In rural areas, leakage does exist. This is a good thing and prevents food waste. However, it can only be picked up after the owner harvests it. Nowadays, most people use harvesters to harvest crops, often missing a lot. Under normal circumstances, the owner will manually pick up the leaks again after the machine has finished harvesting. Only the rest can be picked up by others. If you follow the harvester directly to harvest, you will either pick it up or rob it. Judging from the action of the contracting company calling the police, it is obvious that they do not want to see these farmers "picking" corn after the harvester, not to mention that there may be people who run into the confiscated fields to "pick".

;

;As the rural population decreases, governments at all levels encourage social capital to transfer land in rural areas for investment and entrepreneurship. However, cases of agricultural entrepreneurs being robbed are seen on the Internet from time to time: college students who return to their hometowns to start a business are robbed by villagers, watermelons are stolen from greenhouses contracted by outsiders, pumpkins are stolen, and peaches and apples are stolen... In short, no matter what Whatever entrepreneurs sow and raise, it can be stolen. Many entrepreneurs are forced to erect barbed wire fences, install video surveillance, and keep a few dogs to look after them. Not only is the cost high, but the results are not good.

;

;After the robbery incident, the local government will use various excuses to excuse the farmers. Some, like in Dancheng, Henan, said that farmers did not steal, but "picked up" and picked up the leaks after the owner had finished harvesting; some said they were deceived by rumors that the owner did not want them anymore and could pick them up at will. ; Some even directly favored the thief. There was once a melon farmer who got into a fight with a melon thief, causing the melon thief to fall to the ground and suffer a slight injury. When the police arrived at the scene, they asked the melon farmer to pay the thief 300 yuan, which aroused great public attention. They just asked the thief to return the money and settled the matter. In the end, the theft was not recognized and the melon thief was not punished in any way.

;

;Pick one or two watermelons, a few pumpkins, and dozens of corns. It doesn’t look like much, and it doesn’t seem like there’s much to “make a fuss about.” But once there are more people, the number of people who are picked off and taken away is not a small number. If the behavior of one or two people "picking" and "picking" crops is not strictly stopped and punished, there will be groups of people coming to "pick" and "pick", causing huge losses to investors. The repeated occurrence of such incidents will seriously undermine the confidence and enthusiasm of agricultural investors.

;

;The number of rural laborers has decreased, and land has been transferred to foreign investors for a fee to operate on a large scale and collect rent. Some people can also work on farms and receive wages. This is a win-win situation. However, if investors’ interests are not adequately protected, they may not come back. Without outside investors and no people in the village, the land would be abandoned and the farmers would have no income. Where to start talking about rural development?

;

;To solve this problem, we must take a clear-cut stand to protect the interests of agricultural investors and crack down on theft and robbery. We can no longer be confused and "lawless". Perhaps it is difficult to control all the robbers immediately due to the large number of people at the scene, but it is entirely possible to leave video evidence and ask them to return the stolen property afterwards and punish them in accordance with the law. In fact, as long as a severe penalty and a few people are punished, it is enough to deter those who are lucky enough to teach these locals a lesson and not dare to steal again.

; Tue, 17 Oct 2023 09:55:03 +0800 通报落马官员，频现新表述http://www.infzm.com/contents/258722
